creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding with lavender thread, photomechanical illustration of a stubbly male figure smoking a cigarette, printed in offset lithography on green wove paper covers; 24 pp.
inscription: Inside of front cover, black ink pen: Hi Fly! (heart) / Michael Fahy
title: Mr. Fahy's Ten Thousand Dreams Interpreted
